brDecisionText.para: Yes, use warning and/or caution externally (use CIR).
Warning and/or caution cannot always be used externally, so use the warning and/or caution internally.

Ex: using warning in certain description (eg. in crew information/AFM/AOM) is not used externally due to the warning/caution content never duplicates and <warningAndCautionRef> parent is only <content> (not textElementType).
